Description from ISM: Content filters used by CDSs undergo rigorous security testing to ensure they perform as expected and cannot be bypassed.

Title from Copilot: Decrypt encrypted files for content filtering at gateways/CDSs
Description from ISM: Encrypted files imported or exported via gateways or CDSs are decrypted in order to undergo content filtering checks.

Title from Copilot: Unpack archive files for content filtering at gateways/CDSs
Description from ISM: Archive files imported or exported via gateways or CDSs are unpacked in order to undergo content filtering checks.

Title from Copilot: Unpack archives in a controlled manner to preserve filter performance
Description from ISM: Archive files are unpacked in a controlled manner to ensure content filter performance or availability is not adversely affected.

Title from Copilot: Scan transferred files with multiple antivirus engines
Description from ISM: Files imported or exported via gateways or CDSs undergo antivirus scanning using multiple different scanning engines.

Title from Copilot: Execute transferred executables in sandbox for behaviour analysis
Description from ISM: Executable files imported via gateways or CDSs are automatically executed in a sandbox to detect any suspicious behaviour.

Title from Copilot: Filter transferred files by allowed types at gateways/CDSs
Description from ISM: Files imported or exported via gateways or CDSs are filtered for allowed file types.

Title from Copilot: Perform content validation on transferred files
Description from ISM: Files imported or exported via gateways or CDSs undergo content validation.

Title from Copilot: Perform content checking on transferred files
Description from ISM: Files imported or exported via gateways or CDSs undergo content checking.

Title from Copilot: Perform content conversion for transferred files as needed
Description from ISM: Files imported or exported via gateways or CDSs undergo content conversion.

Title from Copilot: Sanitise transferred files' content
Description from ISM: Files imported or exported via gateways or CDSs undergo content sanitisation.

Title from Copilot: Validate digital signatures and checksums on transferred files
Description from ISM: Files imported or exported via gateways or CDSs that have a digital signature or cryptographic checksum are validated.

Title from Copilot: Use evaluated peripheral switches when sharing peripherals between systems
Description from ISM: Evaluated peripheral switches are used when sharing peripherals between systems.

Title from Copilot: High-assurance evaluated peripheral switches for SECRET/TOP SECRET sharing
Description from ISM: Evaluated peripheral switches used for sharing peripherals between SECRET and TOP SECRET systems, or between SECRET or TOP SECRET systems belonging to different security domains, preferably complete a high assurance evaluation.

Title from Copilot: High-assurance evaluated peripheral switches for cross-classified sharing
Description from ISM: Evaluated peripheral switches used for sharing peripherals between SECRET or TOP SECRET systems and any non-SECRET or TOP SECRET systems complete a high assurance evaluation.

Title from Copilot: Maintain data transfer processes and procedures
Description from ISM: Data transfer processes, and supporting data transfer procedures, are developed, implemented and maintained.

Title from Copilot: Prevent export of AUSTEO/AGAO/REL data to unsuitable foreign systems
Description from ISM: Processes, and supporting procedures, are developed, implemented and maintained to prevent AUSTEO, AGAO and REL data in textual and non-textual formats from being exported to unsuitable foreign systems.

Title from Copilot: Hold users accountable for their data transfers
Description from ISM: Users transferring data to and from systems are held accountable for data transfers they perform.

Title from Copilot: Scan manually imported data for malicious or active content
Description from ISM: When manually importing data to systems, the data is scanned for malicious and active content.

Title from Copilot: Quarantine manual imports that fail security checks pending review
Description from ISM: When manually importing data to systems, all data that fails security checks is quarantined until reviewed and subsequently approved or not approved for release.

Title from Copilot: Require review and authorisation before exporting SECRET/TOP SECRET data
Description from ISM: Data exported from SECRET and TOP SECRET systems is reviewed and authorised by a trustworthy source beforehand.

Title from Copilot: Digitally sign authorised SECRET/TOP SECRET exports
Description from ISM: Data authorised for export from SECRET and TOP SECRET systems is digitally signed by a trustworthy source.

Title from Copilot: Limit trustworthy export sources to CISO-verified entities
Description from ISM: Trustworthy sources for SECRET and TOP SECRET systems are limited to people and services that have been verified and authorised as such by the chief information security officer.

Title from Copilot: Check protective markings before manual export
Description from ISM: When manually exporting data from systems, the data is checked for unsuitable protective markings.

Title from Copilot: Validate signatures & perform keyword checks on manual SECRET/TOP SECRET exports
Description from ISM: When manually exporting data from SECRET and TOP SECRET systems, digital signatures are validated and keyword checks are performed within all textual data.

Title from Copilot: Quarantine manual exports that fail security checks pending review
Description from ISM: When manually exporting data from systems, all data that fails security checks is quarantined until reviewed and subsequently approved or not approved for release.

Title from Copilot: Record all data imports and exports in data transfer logs
Description from ISM: Data transfer logs are used to record all data imports and exports from systems.

Title from Copilot: Partially verify data transfer logs at least monthly
Description from ISM: Data transfer logs for systems are partially verified at least monthly.

Title from Copilot: Fully verify SECRET/TOP SECRET data transfer logs monthly
Description from ISM: Data transfer logs for SECRET and TOP SECRET systems are fully verified at least monthly.
